examples: the amount he had in cash was insufficient

definitions.text: the relative magnitude of something with reference to a criterion
examples: an adequate amount of food for four people

definitions.text: how much there is or how many there are of something that you can quantify
a quantity obtained by the addition of a group of numbers

examples: Her action amounted to a rebellion

definitions.text: add up in number or quantity

examples: This idea will never amount to anything
nothing came of his grandiose plans
